bibl.title: assisted by Susanne MARTINSSEN-VON FALCK (Edd.), Methods of Dating Ancient Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 4th Meeting of the Study Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 16-17 April 2005.

DE MOOR Antoine and Cäcilia FLUCK, assisted by Susanne MARTINSSEN-VON FALCK (Edd.), Methods of Dating Ancient Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 4th Meeting of the Study Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 16-17 April 2005.
